titles: A general epistle to all the saints being a visitation of the Fathers love unto the whole flock of God ... : to be read in all the assemblies, of them, that meet together to worship the Father in the spirit and truth ... / E.B.
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Edward Burrough. cf. BM.
